channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-69] Using an extended persistence context in a stateless session bean should throw an exception
item.description:
Using an extended persistence context in a stateless session bean should not initiate. It should throw an exception to notify the user of incorrect use.

See JPA 2.0 spec, section 7.6.2:

"A container-managed extended persistence context can only be initiated within the scope of a stateful session bean."
item.summary: Using an extended persistence context in a stateless session bean should throw an exception

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
